name: CUSTOM Slashed and Destroyed Top
description:
This listing is for a custom slashed and destroyed cotton knit top. 

If you know your measurements please let me know what they are. These tops are very stretchy but I want your top to fit perfectly. 

If you want a color, pattern or size that is not listed please send me a message. 

I CAN MAKE YOUR FAVORITE BAND SHIRT TOTALLY RAD!! If you wanl me to do a specific shirt I will need you to mail the shirt to me. If you decide to do this keep in mind that there are no refunds or exchanges on custom items and I cannot be responsible for shirts lost in the mail. Please mail your shirt with confirmation delivery or with insurance if the shirt is very special. I also cannot gaurantee that the shirt will turn out exactly as you want, but so far I have only had awesome feedback on these! 

Please look through my store for other slashed and destroyed tops that are your favorites. 
You can also look through my sold section for ideas.
If you would like a certain area of your body covered up more or less please let me know.

Please check out my listings for other custom slashed shirts! :)

Here is a review from one of my customers:

"Love this top. Custom fit. Looks great layered on top of tanks or by itself. Seller is great too! Easy to communicate and prompt! A+ Thank you!"


Please contact me if you have any questions!

www.Facebook.com/BangYourHeadClothing

name: xX Dance With The Devil Xx Necklace - ON SALE! from $29.99!
description:
Handcrafted out of pentagram and skull pendants . The charms are connected with 2 jump rings for extra durability. 


Matching bracelet is also available!

Item comes in an organza gift bag.

name: Pentagram Longhorn Skull Earrings
description:
Handcrafted out of pentagram charms and longhorn buffalo skull charms.


Pentagram charm is 1" x 1"
Longhorn buffalo charm is 1 1/2" x 1"




Item comes in an organza gift bag.

name: Pentagram Earrings
description:

name: CUSTOM - Mens - Slashed N Destroyed Sleeveless Shirt
description:
Make the ladies drool with a slashed n destroyed top.

This listing is for a custom slashed and destroyed cotton knit top.
You can give me your specific measurements or just ask for a small, medium, large or XL.
I recommend giving your measurements.
You can get ANY color you would like.

Please look through my store for other slashed and destroyed tops that are your favorites.
You can also look through my sold section for ideas.
If you would like a certain area of your body covered up more or less please let me know.

So please if you purchase this item let me know all these things:

1.) Your measurements or size
2.) Color you want
3.) Any pictures of other slashed shirts you like
4.) Any other info
5.) Any specific areas you want covered up 

I CAN MAKE YOUR FAVORITE BAND SHIRT TOTALLY RAD!! If you want me to do a specific shirt I will need you to mail the shirt to me. If you decide to do this keep in mind that there are no refunds or exchanges on custom items and I cannot be responsible for shirts lost in the mail. Please mail your shirt with confirmation delivery or with insurance if the shirt is very special. I also cannot gaurantee that the shirt will turn out exactly as you want, but so far I have only had awesome feedback on these!
